channel.title: 317 bandos armour/ dragon full/ armadyl/ godswords
channel.description: ok i want to add bandos armour, armadyl, dragon full helm, and godswords to my server but i had forgotten how obviously. i am useing hiyascape v2 for my base and don't tell me to change my source because i coded so much and i don't want to do it again..

other then that it’s all client sided.
and silab obviously works because they’ve thought of many ids that bandos could possibly be.
p.s silab is client not server u dick

item.title: 317 bandos armour/ dragon full/ armadyl/ godswords
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

You have to find the Models (Inventory and Drop) and download them.
Add them into your Client’s Model folder, add the integers to class7.java, and add the correct ids to item.java on server side.

Read full topic
